comments_since_last_sample.body: Why are these grown men wearing a dress?

Greetings  from Sri  Lanka 🇱🇰
Tears of Joy  Came to My Eyes,  When I Saw the Two  Leaders  Embraced Each Other.
This is the True Brotherhood!
May Thousand  Flowers  Bloom in Memory of this Great Occasion!!
May God  Bless  You Shree Mody!
Holy Father Pray 🙏 for India,a Great Country,  With over 5,000 Year Old Civilization. !!!
LONG LIVE THIS FRIENDSHIP, UNTIL THE SUN AND MOON LASTS!!
Godsewadi desh me isaionpar hamla karte hai waha talwe chatne gye hai
Two Great Men meeting each other!!! God Bless India & Rome!!!!So let's us all stand United irrespective of any caste, religion, creed, etc etc & fight against our enemies !!!
Ye hi kaam ye India main nahi kar sakta hindu vote bank naaraaz ho jayega.
Great. So proud of watching this.  🥳🥳🥳
modi ko koie bhar hi mrdegw
